modName: Myst's Hawk and Noble Savage Werewolves Follower
summary:
Follower mod features Noble Savage and Hawk created by MysticalFlare.
They are also a transformable werewolves.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#e06666][size=6][b]Please view Credits/Permission above for further information about the mod and images.[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[color=#ffff00]About this mod:
[/color]My personal fav character Noble Savage from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3730857?tab=user+images]MysticalFlare's[/url] character collections alone with his favorite character Hawk jammed into one mod.  Both followers are transformable werewolves using the werewolf script done by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/24266529]StCooler[/url] for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80574]Dividedbythe9s Rust Follower mod[/url] with inspirations from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66003]TransformHeroFollowerMaskDwemerRX by m150[/url].  When their health reaches below 50% or at will, they will transform into their own unique werewolf skins.  Their werewolf form unarmed damage increase every 15 levels or so:
﻿Level 1: +6 unarmed damage (base)
﻿Level 15: +7 unarmed damage
﻿Level 30: +9 unarmed damage
﻿Level 45: +8 unarmed damage
﻿Level 65: +9 unarmed damage
﻿Level 80: +10 unarmed damage
﻿Level 151: +50 unarmed damage (all damages will stack)

[color=#ffff00]Side Note:[/color]
*If you have [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/76051]Are You There? Mod[/url], please select their default form where XX is your game load order for MystNobleSavage.esp.[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/628XbmK.png[/img][/center]*If Default Form Noble Savage and Hawk is wierding out all of a sudden, open the console and click on the follower then use disable/enable command.
*If for whatever reason Noble Savage and Hawk not appearing again after transformation, please use the prid# below in the console where XX is your game load order for MystNobleSavage.esp.
﻿(To recall Noble Savage back to you) prid XX004906
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿        ﻿moveto player
﻿(To recall Hawk back to you) prid XX0053D1
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ moveto player
*If you use player.placeatme, the copy or cloned version of default form Noble Savage and Hawk won't be able to transform, as the script can only work on the original/referenced follower.  If anything, I'd prefer to meet them in their respective inn location below.
*Please do not use mods/dialogue to turn or infect them, as there will be conflicts.
*After uninstallation, please use [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52363/]Save game script cleaner by Hadoram[/url]﻿ as a parting gift.

[color=#ffff00]Char Desc:

Spell: None
Location: Whiterun Jorrvaskr[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/bhJze1M.png[/img][/center]
Name: Hawk

Outfit: Default Vanilla Leather Armor

Location: Whiterun Drunken Huntsman[center][img]https://i.imgur.com/gX6cy7K.png[/img][/center]
author: IHR
